org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class MetricDataApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.MetricDataApi

public class MetricDataApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ MetricData API.

This class provides access to the @{link MetricData} within the HQ system. Each of the methods in this class return Response objects that wrap the result of the method with a ResponseStatus and a ServiceError that indicates the error if the response status is ResponseStatus.FAILURE.

Method Summary
 StatusResponse addData(Metric metric, java.util.List<DataPoint> data)
          Insert DataPoints for the specified Metric.

Method Detail

getData

public MetricDataResponse getData(Metric metric,
                                  long start,
                                  long end)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Get the MetricData for the given Metric.

Parameters:
metric - The Metric to query.
start - The start time to query, in epoch-millis.
end - The end time to query, in epoch-millis.
Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if the data was succesfully queried. The returned data can be retrieved via MetricDataResponse.getMetricData().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

getData

public LastMetricDataResponse getData(Metric metric)
                               throws java.io.IOException
Get the LastMetricData for the given Metric. This object represents the last metric collection for the given Metric.

Parameters:
metric - The Metric to query.
Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if the data was succesfully queried. The returned data can be retrieved via LastMetricDataResponse.getLastMetricData().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.
